mapper.subject: Fehlende Informationen für Dein Zertifikat
mapper.html:
Hallo {{9.fld6jo9M5hKVGaIq5}},

der Kurs {{1.fldKArcWX0859EeJZ}} endet heute.
Zum Erstellen des zugehörigen Zertifikats bitte die folgenden Daten

  • Geburtsdatum
  • GEG Qualifikationsgruppe

auf dieser Seite nachtragen:
https://www.netzeroacademy.de/certificates

Vielen Dank und viele Grüße

Dein Operations Team

--

Kundenbetreuung
NetZero Academy
+49 (0) 30-5445-3114-0
service@netzeroacademy.de
Rollbergstr. 28a, 12053 Berlin
www.netzeroacademy.de

The content of this email is confidential and intended for the recipient specified in message only. It is strictly forbidden to share any part of this message with any third party, without a written consent of the sender. If you received this message by mistake, please reply to this message and follow with its deletion, so that we can ensure such a mistake does not occur in the future.

notes.text:
After this iterator we should try to find the values for this:

Education ("Berufsqualifizierender Hochschulabschluss", "Andere Berufsgruppen", "Quereinsteiger")

Certificate Type

Problematic might be to recognize people who should only get a certificate after the extension of the course to 160 or 200 UE
This should run every weekday at 8:00
